hero.title: Give Hope, Change Lives
hero.subtitle: Support orphaned children in Bangladesh and help them build a brighter future

about.mission: To provide comprehensive care, education, and support to orphaned children, empowering them to become self-sufficient and productive members of society.
about.vision: A world where every orphaned child has access to quality education, healthcare, and opportunities to thrive.
values: Compassion and dignity for every child
